sub_title: Sr. Manager (through Artemis Profs ) Contract Staffing I European Institutions
summary:
We live in a world of social networks and career worth is estimated by the people we know and how far they can help us achieve our career goals. Therefore If you are a Java professional, Front or Back end, permanent or freelance, connect with me. 

I handle a portfolio of 50+ clients hiring IT professionals in 10 EU countries. I have over 50 IT roles at any point of time. Whether you want to work for the biggest startup in sunny Barcelona or for a EU Institution in the center of Brussels I have positions for you. Having me in your network will always add value at one point of time, if not immediately. 

Most frequently i'm hiring for Contract/ Freelancers for European Institutions in places like Brussels, Amsterdam, Luxembourg and Ispra in Italy.

Most of the freelance projects are for:
Java Developers
Java Enterprise / Solution Architect
Full Stack Java developer
Front End with Angular 
Testing and QA (from Developer to Manager)
Sharepoint (Developer to Architect)
Network Engineer

Join my SKILLS network and challenge me on what I can do for you. 

Want to learn more on how it works? We can connect on 20min Zoom online call to share with your a calculation on how much you can earn, based on your profile, project and location.

school.name: University of South Africa/Universiteit van Suid-Afrika

profile_positions.description:
Me and my team connect IT professionals (Perm & Freelance) to more than 40 clients across Europe. Most of the roles I handle are for Java professionals (front and back end) with experience between 5-30 years. My clients are in 7 EU countries like Spain, Italy, Belgium, Luxembourg and Netherlands and our company is their primary source of Java candidates.

Unlike other recruiters who are Jack of all trades, I don't waste your time. Our 15min call will is an investment in your career as I will always approach you with something you cannot say NO to.

Freelancer or open for permanent role? Let's connect and explore what we can do for each other.
profile_positions.title: IT Recruitment Sr. Manager European Institutions

profile_positions.description:
Being passionate for helping global brands in their tech hiring i started my own firm. In the 15 years of tech head hunting my total reach is at around 20k Java Developer (mainly in Europe). The majority of the hiring has been done trough events, meetups, Xing, Viadeo, Twitter and now Linkedin. 

Largest Milestones:
- I have participated in projects for setting up the tech team of 2 large South African Service based companies where I led the TA team for 8 months and scaled up the company to 156 techies.

- Was hired as Head TA to setup the AI and ML teams of 7 Global Clients (over a period of 15 years) and their Dev Centers in India, Pakistan and Sri Lanka.

- Have handled the reorganization of 3 large Public Institutions in South America and revamped their hiring

- Have hired for EU Institutions Freelancers for Java projects and long term Development and architecture roles.
profile_positions.title: Head Hunter I Freelancer I Java I AI I ML

profile_positions.description:
I started as a Jr Recruiter for Tech hiring where main mode of hiring was through newspapers ads, face to 
face discussions and mainly developers from the local market. In this short period i have hired over 75 developers in 3 main locations
profile_positions.title: Jr Recruiter Tech
